nodes.text: A vault built by the Rakata species to store powerful weapons was located in the Tomb, an ancient prison on the planet Belsavis. Located in the Warlord's Deep region of the Tomb, the vault was cracked open by the Esh-kha species after they were released in the invasion of Belsavis, and after the Esh-kha began to use the weapons against Imperial forces in the area, Specialist Nattis of the Imperial Reclamation Service recruited Imperial forces to recover the weapons from the vault.
The forbidden weapons vault appears as a location on Belsavis in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, and is the site of the Imperial mission "Found In Translation."
